awd_titl_txt: A Liberal Arts College NSFNET Connection
awd_abstract_narration: Lake Forest College requests support from NSF for connection of                 its campus network to NSFNET.  They will contract with                          netIllinois to provide a medium speed (56 thousand bits per                     second) connection to the NSFNET, a high speed (1.5 - 45 million                bits per second) National Backbone network.                                                                                                                     The College needs greater functionality and network speed to be                 able to access supercomputers, libraries, and make file transfers               along with being able to implement a more reliable mail system.                 Students and faculty research will benefit from the link.  This                 is also a unique opportunity for the school to explore innovative               educational resources.***//
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
